# File lib/cucumber/formatter/html.rb, line 105
      def visit_feature_element(feature_element)
        css_class = {
          Ast::Scenario        => 'scenario',
          Ast::ScenarioOutline => 'scenario outline'
        }[feature_element.class]
        @builder.div(:class => css_class) do
          super
        end
        @open_step_list = true
      end
